description.value:
This spirit power represents an extreme fixation on a particular object. While this is most often a result of insatiable greed, this could also represent fondness for a cherished heirloom or attachment to a defining piece of art that a person created. This focus is appropriate for a character particularly attached to their wealth or to a particular piece of gear. It expresses itself as an ability to telekinetically control small objects. You can cast @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Telekinetic Projectile] at will as an innate occult spell.

Once per day, you can cast one of the following spells as a 5th-rank innate occult spell: @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Animate Rope], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Animated Assault], or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Telekinetic Haul].
